data.title: Upscale feel in downtown.
data.text: Great atmosphere for a girls night out or date night.  Enjoyed the tacos, appreciated the ability to mix different taco options & not have to get 3 of the same.  Sangria was delicious & they are not watered down as some places would do to skimp. Hope to take the hubby there for a date night!

data.title: Great beer selection, delicious food and cool vibe.
data.text: The cocktails, beer and food are awesome.  The wine list is limited but has some tasty selections.  Gourmet tacos,  great dishes including poblano mashed potatoes....  ask for a side.  Mahi, pork and short rib tacos are mmmm

data.title: Great variety of beers on tap and eclectic tacos
data.text: The place has a nice upscale appearance, gleaming with lots of glass.  Nice viewing area of the brewing room & tables inside there for tastings.  We had dinner in the restaurant.  I did a flight of 4 of the beers availble.  Unfortunately, they do not have their own beer yet - should be available soon.  The menu is very eclectic - they offer a variety of world flavors for the tacos ranging from a Bob Marley, to Korean BBQ, Chili Glazed Shrimp and The Three Little Pigs.  Three of us split 4 tacos and the Cubano.  Our waitress had them cut our dishes so it was easier to share.  I was impressed with our food.

data.title: Great food, especially the fish tacos! Lots of great beer!
data.text: It's a great place for lunch, after work or dinner. Great for a work lunch or meeting friends couples or family in the evening. The atmosphere is fun, yet not too loud so its a good place to have conversations. I strongly recommend it and have gone back on several occasions. Love the Hoppy Gnome.

data.title: Great Tacos!
data.text: Beer and alcohol selection was great. A great variety of tacos! Atmosphere is great and the upcoming brew your own beer room should be cool!

data.title: Wonderful Place
data.text:
Had the opportunity to try this place with 2 daughters and my favorite Red Head "Ella"

I order the Cuban Torta and a side of Hoppy Hash.   It was amazing!   Brietta ordered a couple of different Tacos "Very Unique ones"

Cortney ordered the Flat Bread style sandwich and some type of Mac n Cheese.   The only thing I didn't care for was the Mac n Cheese

I highly recommend this place.

data.title: Flavor overload
data.text: Amazing flavor to all the food choices. Good beer selection. Prices a little high for the amount of food you get but good place for lunch!

data.title: Night out with the hubby
data.text: Neither of us could decide what to make for dinner. So, we went out! The food is good and made fresh. The micro brew was delicious and complimented the food nicely. Our waiter was friendly, yet gave us our space. My husband thought it was just O. K.

data.title: Great Eats & Drinks in Ft Wayne
data.text: Totally cool vibe. Great energy. All dishes were amazing. Good beers. Good Cocktails. I wish that there were a Hoppy Gnome in the town where we live.

data.title: Brunch
data.text: Friendly service the waitress was helpful when my daughter wasn't sure.  delicious food and the prices was affordable

data.title: Fun Restaurant
data.text: We really enjoyed our meal and the selection of craft beers. We let our server Matthew choose our tacos so that we could sample each other's. Matthew was fun, energetic and selected a delicious meal for us- he is a great asset to this fun restaurant!

data.title: Disappointed
data.text: This is a micro brewery type of place in the downtown area.  Many types of beers available for the sophisticated beer drinker.  Not so great for food.  We found the prices unreasonable for the quality and quantity of food being served.  Small plate sizes, large plate prices.  Food was served timely, presented well, but had no flavor or seasonings.  Bottom line, drink but eat some place else.

data.title: Fun place with light bites and beer -- lots of beer
data.text: This is a great little place with a wide selection of micro brew beers and light far.  We had the fattoush salad that was nice and light.  The tacos are also great, with the Three Little Pigs (pork belly) and the Korean short ribs being stand outs.  The Chorizo Mac and Cheese is also good -- but very filling.  A fun place with fast service.

data.title: Great experience!
data.text: From the really recently service to the really great fresh from scratch food, to the amazing selection of beers, it was a great experience. I'm not one who is enabled of steel and concrete, and though trendy looking, C what made me comfortable was the accommodating staff, the great selection of beers and the laid back atmosphere. There of us ashes the menu that included Taco's that were unique and flavorful, a great salad with cheese and these amazing little pickled peppers and a wild mushroom turrets with goat cheese on this warm amazing fresh bread. Every step of the way I was both impressed and enjoyed the meal. For me it's pricy, but the company and the service message it worth the cost. Highly recommend this downtown eatery and if your love craft brews this has such a great variety.

data.title: YUM!
data.text: We had a variety of tacos and the woodland mushroom torta. All were delicious. Our waiter, Conner, was excellent. Great service in a nice atmosphere.

data.title: Fun place, unique food
data.text: Came for family "Friday Fun Night". A little noisy but a fun atmosphere and great service. Tried multiple different tacos. All excellent. They even brought out a "fish taco" with Goldfish for our daughter.  She loved it!

data.title: Ask the waitress
data.text: I always ask for the waitress recommendations on the food. She did not disappoint tonight. Whiskey puerco was fantastic. And an Old Style on tap. With hash browns on the side. Really really like this place. The tacos were also great. Highly recommended.

data.title: Sounds cooler
data.text: So this is a fancy version of a beer bar.  The name would make you think they brew their own beer, but they instead have an overpriced great selection of beer.  I would expect this style and decor as an overpriced beer place in DC or NY, not Ft. Wayne.  the food selection looked okay, but we were out for beer.  We left after one round to find something that felt a bit more local or brewed onsite.

data.title: Interesting menu and excellent beer selection
data.text: We chose this place based on its location downtown, close to the theater.  The beer menu was outstanding, with many different selections than you usually see in Fort Wayne.  The staff was attentive and helpful.  The braised beef ribs were outstanding, if a little bit sweet for a beef dish.  We enjoyed our meal quite a lot.  A bit on the pricey side but still would recommend it.

data.title: Loved this place!
data.text: Amazing food and wonderful wait staff.  Can't ask for much more.  Everything ordered at our table was delicious, the small plates are anything but small and the tacos are amazing.  Loved finishing off our meal with the s'mores.  With the dark chocolate and not too sweet marshmallows it made for a fun and delicious end to our meal.  Next time we are in Fort Wayne, we will be back.
